version_description: The cloud music services keep on coming to HEOS!  This time it is Tidal available in 43 countries globally including USA, Canada, UK, Ireland, Sweden, Netherlands, Norway, Finland, France, Germany, Australia and New Zealand.  You can make a stereo pair of HEOS 5 or stereo pair of HEOS 7.  iPad App now supports landscape mode.  Easily see what you have connected to the digital and analog inputs of all the HEOS devices in your system by giving each input a custom name such as: CD player.  Now for convenience you can also choose to hide digital and analog inputs you don't usually use.  Look in Music Sources under the Settings menu.

version_name: 1.310.150Bug fixes and performance improvements.Version 1.310.60The HEOS product family is growing!  Please welcome HEOS HomeCinema
1.310.180Bug fixes and performance improvements.Version 1.310.60The HEOS product family is growing!  Please welcome HEOS HomeCinema

version_description:
1.331.135:
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1.331.70:
We have completely updated the look of the HEOS app. Enjoy our modern, high resolution appearance. Amazon Music joins the HEOS music services party! (USA only). Check the Wi-Fi signal strength and link quality of every HEOS device on one page. Save space in the Rooms screen by optionally representing large groups of speakers as a single line. HEOS can take care of device software updates automatically. Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We're excited to announce the next-generation HEOS Amp and HEOS Link now including built-in Bluetooth functionality and support for High Resolution Audio. WAV, FLAC and ALAC music files up to 24-bit 192kHz are currently supported.  Added the ability to reorder radio stations in HEOS favorites.  Bug fixes and performance improvements.  This will be the last version of the HEOS app that supports iOS 5.

* TV Sound Grouping (BETA) - group TV sound from your HEOS HomeCinema or HEOS Drive to hear TV sound in other rooms
* Mood Mix music service - great content for your business patrons with outstanding HEOS audio. (Available in US, Canada, Europe, Australia)
* Reorder the Music Tab - long press and drag to rearrange tiles. (Hide services you don’t use from Settings/Music Sources/Online Music)
* Japanese Language Support
* Access tone controls from Now Playing screen
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

We are making history again!  HEOS multi-room technology comes to Audio-Video Receivers for the first time ever.  The new models: Denon AVR-X4300H, Denon AVR-X6300H, Marantz SR7011, and Marantz AV7703 bring new best-in-class audio and features and now work with your HEOS network and music sources too!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Added support for connecting a HEOS device to a wireless network using the Lightning to 3.5mm Headphone Jack Adapter included with the iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus.

We are adding Amazon’s newest streaming music service called Amazon Music Unlimited.  This is a great optional upgrade adding tens of millions of songs including new releases!  See Amazon for details.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

HEOS is proud to introduce the new HEOS Bar, HEOS Subwoofer and HEOS AVR! HEOS speakers and the HEOS Amp can now be used as wireless surrounds with the HEOS Bar and HEOS AVR. The new HEOS Subwoofer wirelessly pumps up the bass on all HEOS products.
* TV Sound Grouping added to Denon/Marantz AV receivers with HEOS.
* Low level LED shows when HEOS is saving power.
* Long press mute button for deep standby mode.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Now share music from your PC, Mac or any networked storage device directly with HEOS.  Set it up under Settings, Music Sources, Network Shares…  Requires one or more current generation HS2 HEOS devices in your system.  Added AWA music service in Japan.  Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Amazon Music now available in the UK, Germany, France, Italy, Spain and Japan. iHeartRadio now available in Australia and New Zealand. HEOS Bar and HEOS AVR now support Dolby Vision. Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Now you can search within Amazon Music.  Search for Playlists, Stations, Artists and Albums.  HEOS can play custom internet radio stream locations (URL) previously added to your Tunein account.  Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Added support for new Marantz ND8006 Networked CD Player.  Improved Wi-Fi security.  Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Updates to Privacy Policy.

Added Airplay 2 support (Denon and Marantz models with HEOS built-in plus HEOS HomeCinema HS2). Improved wireless surround sound from HEOS speakers and HEOS Amp when connected to HEOS Bar or HEOS AVR. Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Added: IMAX Enhanced for Denon AVR/AVC-X8500H, Marantz AV8805; eARC for Denon AVR-X3400H, Marantz SR6012 and other eARC ready AVRs; Tuner control for Denon CEOL N10; External amplifier control for Marantz ND8006, NA6006 Denon DNP-800NE; CD time seek for Marantz ND8006, Denon CEOL N10; Works with Alexa available in India & Japan.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Added: IMAX Enhanced for Denon AVR/AVC-X8500H, Marantz AV8805; eARC for Denon AVR-X3400H, Marantz SR6012 and other eARC ready AVRs; Tuner control for Denon CEOL N10; External amplifier control for Marantz ND8006, NA6006 Denon DNP-800NE; CD time seek for Marantz ND8006, Denon CEOL N10; Works with Alexa available in India & Japan.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Added: IMAX Enhanced for Denon AVR/AVC-X8500H, Marantz AV8805; eARC for Denon AVR-X3400H, Marantz SR6012 and other eARC ready AVRs; Tuner control for Denon CEOL N10; External amplifier control for Marantz ND8006, NA6006 Denon DNP-800NE; CD time seek for Marantz ND8006, Denon CEOL N10; Works with Alexa available in India & Japan.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Added IMAX Enhanced for the Marantz SR6013 and above & Denon AVR-X4500H and above. Improved Wi-Fi setup experience. Added ability to edit Radio Tuner Presets on Denon CEOL RCD-N10. Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Added controls for DAB/DAB+ Tuner and Speaker A/B in the Marantz M-CR612. Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
HEOS now supports the free tier of Spotify. Added power on/off capability for the Google Assistant. Bug fixes and performance improvements. This version supports iOS 9 and higher.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

All HEOS, Denon, Marantz products with HEOS Built-in work with Alexa and the Google Assistant (we’ve just upgraded first generation HEOS products). Enable the HEOS Home Entertainment skill for Alexa or the HEOS action for the Google Assistant. Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Added Amazon Music HD (US, JP, UK, DE) up to 24-bit-192kHz. Added “What’s New” and “Tips for HEOS” to Settings menu. Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Support for the all-new Denon Home 150, 250, 350 speaker series showcasing 110 years of Hi-Fi heritage, clean, modern industrial design, Airplay 2 and Quick Selects.  Added Bluetooth Transmitter for headphone output, supported in Denon and Marantz AV and Stereo receivers (released in 2019) with HEOS Built-in.  Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Support for the all-new Denon Home 150, 250, 350 speaker series showcasing 110 years of Hi-Fi heritage, clean, modern industrial design, Airplay 2 and Quick Selects.  Adjust brightness of touch controls on the Denon Home speakers (Settings-My Devices-Touch Controls).  Added Bluetooth Transmitter for headphone output, supported in Denon and Marantz AV and Stereo receivers (released in 2019) with HEOS Built-in.  Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Enhanced touch controls for all Denon Home speakers; double tap Play/Pause button to skip to the next track, triple tap to skip to the previous track or beginning of the current track.  Added new setting to optimize the bass of any Denon Home speaker (Settings > My Devices > Denon Home > Placement).  Use Multitasking on iPad to control your HEOS system while you answer email or browse the Internet.  Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Enhanced touch controls for all Denon Home speakers; double tap Play/Pause button to skip to the next track, triple tap to skip to the previous track or beginning of the current track.  Added new setting to optimize the bass of any Denon Home speaker (Settings > My Devices > Denon Home > Placement).  Use Multitasking on iPad to control your HEOS system while you answer email or browse the Internet.  Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Connecting devices to your home network is now even faster and easier. Added new languages: Czech, Finnish, Portuguese, Croatian, Turkish. Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Connecting devices to your home network is now even faster and easier. Added new languages: Czech, Finnish, Portuguese, Croatian, Turkish. Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Connecting devices to your home network is now even faster and easier. Added new languages: Czech, Finnish, Portuguese, Croatian, Turkish. Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Support for the new Denon Home Sound Bar 550 with Dolby Atmos & DTS:X 3D audio. Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Modernized the app UI and added light and dark modes!  Added Alexa Built-in to the Denon Home product range.  Added wireless subwoofer and wireless surround capability to the Denon Home Sound Bar 550.  Improved bass performance for Denon Home Sound Bar 550.  Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Fixed music streaming from iPhone and iPad.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Adding support for Marantz MODEL 40n, an integrated stereo amplifier boasting the convenience of HEOS Built-in and exceptional Marantz analog amplification. Denon Home Sound Bar 550 now supports wireless subwoofers and surround speakers with HEOS Built-in. Bug fixes and performance improvements.
